name: Death Race - Twisted
description:
Made for the pygame summer jam 2021.

The theme was: "remake an old video game with a twist" so we decided to take the old arcade game death race, but instead of being the car you are the person who tries to defend from the killer car.

Pixel Art and programming are made by me, Le Proiz

Sound effects and music are from MarioKurt

made with Python and Pygame

Other tools:

BeepBox, Piskel, MS Paint, Sfxr.
